m_szDocTitle: No April Fools Joke: Slushy Coating Friday - 50s Return by Sunday - StarTribune.com
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- No April Fools Joke: Slushy Coating Friday - 50s Return by Sunday By                   Paul Douglas 48 F. high temperature in the Twin Cities Wednesday. 49 F. average high on March 30. 57 F. high on March 30, 2015. .40" rain fell at KMSP yesterday. March 31, 1896: A strong snowstorm dumps 13.5 inches of snow at Maple Plain. Vivid lightning is also in the storm with 10-12 flashes per minute. Visibility was down to less than one block. The high temperature was 57 at Maple Plain the day before. March 31, 1843: The low temperature at Ft. Snelling plummets to -11.
